2: (\forall int i; 0 <= i && i <= size/2 -1; !((2*i+1 < size && compare(elements[i],elements[2*i+1]) > 0)||(2*i+2 < size && compare(elements[i],elements[2*i+2]) > 0)))
3-1: (\forall int i;1 <= i && i <= \old(size) && \old(elements[i].isReferenced());(\exists int j ; 1 <= j && j <= size;elements[j].equals(\old(elements[i]))))
3-2: (\forall int i;1 <= i && i <= \old(size) && \old(!(elements[i].isReferenced()));(\forall int j ; 1 <= j && j <= size;!elements[j].equals(\old(elements[i]))))
